title: WITHDRAWN: Death and Recovery of Kidney Function Among Patients Continued on Dialysis After Discharge From Hospital Stays Complicated by Acute Kidney Injury: A Cohort Study.
abstract: This article has been withdrawn at the request of the authors and editors because after publication of the Article in Press, the authors discovered that there had been an error in the programming of the statistical analysis. Once the error was corrected, the conclusions of the article were no longer supported. The Publisher and authors apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. The full Elsevier Policy on Article Withdrawal can be found at https://www.elsevier.com/about/our-business/policies/article-withdrawal.
